title: Gov. Shapiro discusses AI regulation in schools during Carnegie visit
description: High school students are increasingly turning to artificial intelligence for homework help, advice and even companionship — leaving school administrators wondering where to draw the line. title: New 50m pool opens at Arena Joondalup as part of $13m upgrade
description: In addition to the new 50m pool, the facility now also features artificial intelligence-powered drowning detection technology, which previously helped save a swimmer’s life at another Perth leisure centre.
content:
Swimmers got their first look on Friday at the new 50m lap pool at Arena Joondalup, with a $13 million upgrade to the venue’s aquatic facilities now officially open.
The new state-of-the-art facility took just over 12 months to complete and has been ... [2386 chars]

title: India world's fastest-growing major economy: Canadian PM Carney after landing in Mumbai
description: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney is in India for a four-day visit. He aims to build strong partnerships in trade, energy, technology, and artificial intelligence. Carney met with business leaders in Mumbai. He will hold talks with Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi in New Delhi. This visit seeks to boost bilateral ties between the two nations.
content:

title: The hypothetical nuclear attack that escalated the Pentagon’s showdown with Anthropic
description: Start-up Anthropic and the U.S. military are careening toward a clash over government use of artificial intelligence — and whether it should be allowed to kill.

title: The new anti-AI trade sweeping Wall Street: 'HALO'
description: Investors are bidding up companies with hefty real assets such as grids, pipelines and heavy machinery that are least likely to be replaced by artificial intelligence.
content: Suddenly, what's old is new again. There's a popular trade sweeping Wall Street that's offering an old world solution to the threat of AI disruption: "HALO," or "Heavy Assets, Low Obsolescence." What that means is that more investors are betting that... [3691 chars]

title: Anthropic faces deadline on deal for Pentagon to use AI model
description: Anthropic faces a 5 p.m. EST deadline to comply with the Pentagon and allow it to use the company's artificial intelligence system without restraint.
content:

title: Pentagon Standoff Is a Decisive Moment for How A.I. Will Be Used in War
description: The Pentagon’s contract dispute with Anthropic is part of a wider clash about the use of artificial intelligence for national security and who decides on any safeguards.
content:
The fight between the Department of Defense and the artificial intelligence company Anthropic has ostensibly been about a $200 million contract over the use of A.I. in classified systems.
